original_text: This is how you must eat the lamb: Dress yourselves so that you are ready to travel. Put your shoes on your feet. Take your stick in your hand. Then eat the food quickly. This is the Passover meal which shows that you obey me, the Lord.
korean_text: 너희는 그것을 이렇게 먹을지니 허리에 띠를 띠고 발에 신을 신고 손에 지팡이를 잡고 급히 먹으라 이것이 여호와의 유월절이니라

sentences.original_text: This is how you must eat the lamb
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 너희가 어린 양을 먹어야 할 방식이다

sentences.original_text: Dress yourselves so that you are ready to travel
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 여행할 준비가 되도록 옷을 입어라

sentences.original_text: Put your shoes on your feet
Take your stick in your hand
which shows that you obey me
